summary:
this is a retexture for werewolf eye, making them more natural i made 8 variations to choose from so you can pick the one that is similar to your characters eyes.

to install: extrack the file and pick the color file you like (they have pictures in their files so you can know what will it look like) place the textures file to your skyri
descriptionHtml:
these are retextures for werewolf eyes, making them more natural. includes 18 variants. you can use them as modders resource if you want

to install: extract the file and pick the color file you like (they have pictures in their files so you can know what will it look like) place the textures file to your skyrim data folder

to uninstall: go in your skyrim folder Data/textures/actors/character/eyes and erase the "eyewerewolfbeastbrown.dds"
author: cansu
